      • hello

        public SMTPClient hello(java.lang.String hostname,
                        boolean useEncryption)
                 throws SMTPException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Sends EHLO (or HELO) to the server, followed by STARTTLS, if supported.
        Parameters:
        hostname - The hostname of the machine sending the email.
        useEncryption - If false, STARTTLS capabilities will not be acted upon.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If writing fails.
        SMTPException - If an SMTP protocol error occurred.

      • addHeader

        public SMTPClient addHeader(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String value)
                     throws SMTPException
        Creates a header or appends to its value if it already exists.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the header.
        value - The value of the header.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        SMTPException - If the header name contains a colon, making it invalid.
